DOC.brief_title: Protein Expression Potential Diagnostic Biomarker Cervical Dysplasia and/or Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate utility MN protein , novel tumor-associated antigen , potential diagnostic biomarker cervical glandular and/or squamous neoplasia patient cytologic diagnosis atypical glandular cell undetermined significance ( AGUS ) . II . Measure frequency type cervical pathology associate diagnosis AGUS patient . III . Determine whether presence high-risk type human papilloma virus ( HPV ) ThinPrep cervical cell specimen predict presence cervical glandular and/or squamous cell neoplasia patient . IV . Determine relationship MN antigen expression presence high-risk HPV patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo Pap smear follow ThinPrep cervical cell specimen collection time direct colposcopic examination . Patients undergo cone biopsy cervix use loop electrosurgical excision procedure endocervical curettage , excisional cone biopsy cervix without endocervical curettage , hysterectomy . Patients perimenopausal postmenopausal negative cervical cone biopsy also undergo endometrial biopsy curettage . The Pap smear specimen analyze determine MN antigen expression ThinPrep specimen analyze presence high-risk human papilloma virus determine MN antigen marker ( e.g. , P16 ) expression . Patients undergo hysterectomy follow every 6 month 2 year . All patient follow 4 , 26 , 30 week .
DOC.criteria: Cytologically confirm atypical glandular cell undetermined significance ( AGUS ) Must schedule undergo complete histologic examination cervix cone biopsy use loop electrosurgical excision procedure endocervical curettage , excisional cone biopsy without endocervical curettage , hysterectomy within 6 month initial cytologic diagnosis AGUS No history endometrial hyperplasia No history cancer endometrium , vagina , cervix HIV negative No pregnant patient high risk excessive bleed preterm labor cone biopsy perform No prior cytotoxic chemotherapy vaginal and/or cervical cancer No prior radiotherapy vagina cervix No concurrent radiotherapy vagina cervix No prior hysterectomy
